isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 5 Engine Service Manual - Fuel System - Periodic Service - Secondary Fuel Filter Element

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, do not smoke and keep fuel away from flames and sparks.

note.para: Engine will not run without the secondary fuel filter element installed properly. When installed properly the secondary fuel filter element pushes down the fuel return tube, allowing fuel to flow into the filter housing.

step1.para: Remove fuel filter cap from the secondary fuel filter housing.
Remove and discard fuel filter cap O-ring.
Pull fuel filter up and out of fuel filter housing and dispose of filter element properly.
Clean seal areas and install a new O-ring on fuel filter cap.
Clean out debris from inside the secondary fuel filter housing.

Install a new fuel filter element in the secondary fuel filter housing. Rotate filter element slightly until filter engages the return tube assembly and can be moved up and down against spring pressure.
Lubricate fuel filter cap threads and new O-ring with clean diesel fuel.
Tighten secondary fuel filter cap to special torque .
When all fuel system components are installed and tight, turn key on and check for fuel leaks. If fuel is leaking turn off engine and repair leaks.
